name: openclaw-azure
description: Azure deployment template for OpenClaw AI Assistant

scripts.lint: npm run lint:json && npm run format:check
scripts.lint:json: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const file = 'deploy/azuredeploy.json'; try { JSON.parse(fs.readFileSync(file, 'utf8')); console.log('✅ JSON is valid'); } catch (e) { console.error('❌ JSON Error:', e.message); process.exit(1); }"
scripts.validate-template: npm run lint:json && echo '✅ ARM template validation passed'
